title: Virtual Classroom System Utilization Course for Military Language Training

context.prior_knowledge: Basic military terminology and communication skills
context.additional_context: Application of a virtual classroom system (Moodle-based) for military language training in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments. Provision of real-time feedback centered on formative assessment

learning_goals: Learners can understand and utilize 50 core military operation-related vocabulary items with 80% accuracy through a virtual classroom system.
Learners perform role-playing communication based on military scenarios using virtual classroom discussion features at least three times.
Learners submit weekly learning journals at least three times using content creation and evaluation features in a smartphone-based virtual classroom environment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
